Class NodeTypeBusiness

  • java.lang.Object

public class NodeTypeBusiness
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for all activities with neo4j database regarding the Nodetypes in the neo4j database

      • getNodeTypesWithCertainRelationshipAndDirection

        public org.neo4j.ogm.model.Result getNodeTypesWithCertainRelationshipAndDirection(java.lang.String nodeId,
                                                                                  java.lang.String relationship,
                                                                                  java.lang.String direction)
        method which queries nodetypes which are on the other end of a given relationship and a given direction and a given nodetype
        Parameters:
        nodeId - is the nodetype on the one side of the relationship
        relationship - is the relationshiptype
        direction - is the direction (ingoing/outgoing)
        Returns:
        a Result of the queried nodetypes which fulfill the given conditions

      • getRelationsOfNodeTypeWithDirection

        public org.neo4j.ogm.model.Result getRelationsOfNodeTypeWithDirection(java.lang.String nodeId,
                                                                      java.lang.String direction)
        method which queries all relationshiptypes of a certain nodetype and a given direction
        Parameters:
        nodeId - is the nodetype for which the relationshiptypes are queried
        direction - is the direction the relationshiptypes must fulfill (ingoig/outgoing)
        Returns:
        a Result of relationshiptypes with the given parameter
